## SuggestReasonMap interface

A mapping of the handler matches with their reasons for occurring within the suggest state.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SuggestReasonMap 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [change](./prosemirror-suggest.suggestreasonmap.change.md) | <code>SuggestStateMatchReason&lt;ChangeReason&gt;</code> | Reasons triggering the onChange handler. |
|  [exit](./prosemirror-suggest.suggestreasonmap.exit.md) | <code>SuggestStateMatchReason&lt;ExitReason&gt;</code> | Reasons triggering the <code>onExit</code> handler |
